Extension.url (url):(equivalent)http://hl7.org/fhir/StructureDefinition/Extension#Extension.urlElement `Extension.url` is mapped to FHIR R4B element `Extension.url`.
Extension.value[x] (value[x]):(equivalent)http://hl7.org/fhir/StructureDefinition/Extension#Extension.value[x]Note that the target element context `Extension.value[x]` is a choice-type element and cannot directly hold extensions. name: ConceptMapR5ExtensionElementsForR4Extension
title: Cross-version ConceptMap for FHIR R5 resources in FHIR R4
description: This ConceptMap represents the cross-version mapping of resource FHIR R5 for use in FHIR R4.

target.comment: Element `Extension.url` is mapped to FHIR R4B element `Extension.url`.

Note that the target element context `Extension.value[x]` is a choice-type element and cannot directly hold extensions. The context is moved up to parent element `Extension`.
Element `Extension.value[x]` is mapped to FHIR R4B element `Extension.value[x]`.
Note that the target element context `Extension.value[x]` is a choice-type element and cannot directly hold extensions. The context is moved up to parent element `Extension`.
